titleStmt.title: The widow's mite, humbly offer'd, not impos'd; shewing by Scripture, why the seventh day of the Lord's rest is to be kept in Christ, under the Name Christian and Gospel Dispensation, and that Christ, which is Spirit, was one with the Father in creating ...
titleStmt.author: Redford, Elizabeth.
